comment.author: 47524421@N08
comment._content: Douglas YC-124B-DL Globemaster II 51-072 (Model 1182E c/n 43406). Ordered as YKC-124B, this was a turboprop variant of the C-124A with four Pratt & Whitney YT34-P-6 turboprops, originally proposed as a tanker it was used for trials on the operation of turboprop aircraft. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/4559103443/] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/4559733538/in/photostream/]
